Determine growth loss

Source: R/growth_parameters.R
dot-determine_growth_loss.Rd

Determine growth loss

Usage

.determine_growth_loss(df, max_od_data)

Arguments

df

A data.frame with timepoint and mean fields.

max_od_data

A data.frame with the information output from .determine_max_growth()

Value

A data.frame with the total loss of growth from the moment when maximum growth is reached
